verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> there were in the <S%G1577>church<s%> that was <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G1320>teachers;<s%> as <S%G921>Barnabas,<s%> and <S%G4826>Simeon<s%> that was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3526>Niger,<s%> and <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> of <S%G2957>Cyrene,<s%> and <S%G3127>Manaen,<s%> which had been <S%G4939>brought<s%> up with <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch,<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul.<s%>

As they <S%G3008>ministered<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G3522>fasted,<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G873>Separate<s%> me <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> I have <S%G4341>called<s%> them.
And when they had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> and <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> them, they <S%G630>sent<s%> them <S%G630>away.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> they, being <S%G1599>sent<s%> <S%G1599>forth<s%> by the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2718>departed<s%> to <S%G4581>Seleucia;<s%> and from <S%G1564>there<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> to <S%G2954>Cyprus.<s%>

And when they were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4529>Salamis,<s%> they <S%G2605>preached<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%> and they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> to their <S%G5257>minister.<s%>

And when they had <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G3520>isle<s%> to <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3097>sorcerer,<s%> a <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet,<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G919>Barjesus:<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> was with the <S%G446>deputy<s%> of the country, <S%G4588>Sergius<s%> <S%G3972>Paulus,<s%> a <S%G4908>prudent<s%> <S%G435>man;<s%> <S%G3778>who<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> for <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> and <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> and <S%G1934>desired<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But <S%G1681>Elymas<s%> the <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%> (for <S%G3779>so<s%> is his <S%G3686>name<s%> by <S%G3177>interpretation)<s%> <S%G436>withstood<s%> them, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G1294>turn<s%> <S%G1294>away<s%> the <S%G446>deputy<s%> from the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4569>Saul,<s%> <S%G3739>(who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%>) <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G816>set<s%> his eyes <S%G1519>on<s%> him.

And <S%G2036>said,<s%> O <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>subtlety<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4468>mischief,<s%> you <S%G5207>child<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> you <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> will you not <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G1294>pervert<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord?<s%>

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is on you, and you shall be <S%G5185>blind,<s%> not <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> for a <S%G2540>season.<s%> And <S%G3916>immediately<s%> there <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him a <S%G887>mist<s%> and a <S%G4655>darkness;<s%> and he <S%G4013>went<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> some to <S%G5497>lead<s%> him by the <S%G5497>hand.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G446>deputy,<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G1096>done,<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> being <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and his <S%G3588>company<s%> <S%G4012><s%> <S%G321>loosed<s%> from <S%G3974>Paphos,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G4011>Perga<s%> in <S%G3828>Pamphylia:<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G672>departing<s%> from them <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

But when they <S%G1330>departed<s%> from <S%G4011>Perga,<s%> they <S%G3854>came<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch<s%> in <S%G4099>Pisidia,<s%> and <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> the <S%G752>rulers<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> You <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> for the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> on.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G450>stood<s%> up, and <S%G2678>beckoning<s%> with his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> and you that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> give <S%G191>audience.<s%>

The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> and <S%G5312>exalted<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> they <S%G3940>dwelled<s%> as <S%G1722>strangers<s%> <S%G3940><s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and with an <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G1023>arm<s%> <S%G1806>brought<s%> he them out of it.
And <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of <S%G5063>forty<s%> <S%G5063>years<s%> <S%G5159>suffered<s%> he their <S%G5159>manners<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And when he had <S%G2507>destroyed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G5477>Chanaan,<s%> he <S%G2624>divided<s%> their <S%G1093>land<s%> to them by <S%G2624>lot.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> that he <S%G1325>gave<s%> to them <S%G2923>judges<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the space of <S%G5071>four<s%> <S%G5071>hundred<s%> and <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

And <S%G2547>afterward<s%> they <S%G154>desired<s%> a <S%G935>king:<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to them <S%G4569>Saul<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2797>Cis,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin,<s%> by the space of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

And when he had <S%G3179>removed<s%> him, he <S%G1453>raised<s%> up to them <S%G1138>David<s%> to be their <S%G935>king;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G3140>gave<s%> their <S%G3140>testimony,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> own <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G4160>fulfill<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> my <S%G2307>will.<s%>

Of <S%G5127>this<s%> man's <S%G4690>seed<s%> has <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel<s%> a <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

When <S%G2491>John<s%> had first <S%G4296>preached<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4383><s%> his <S%G1529>coming<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

And as <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> his <S%G1408>course,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Whom<s%> <S%G5282>think<s%> you that I <S%G1511>am?<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not he. But, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>comes<s%> one <S%G3326>after<s%> me, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> of his <S%G4228>feet<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>loose.<s%>

<S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G5399>fears<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to you is the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G649>sent.<s%>

For they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and their <S%G758>rulers,<s%> because they <S%G50>knew<s%> him not, <S%G2532>nor<s%> yet the <S%G5456>voices<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day, they have <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> them in <S%G2919>condemning<s%> him.
And though they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> in him, yet <S%G154>desired<s%> they <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that he should be <S%G337>slain.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> that was <S%G1125>written<s%> of him, they <S%G2507>took<s%> him <S%G2507>down<s%> from the <S%G3586>tree,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> him in a <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>
But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> him from the <S%G3498>dead:<s%>

And he was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> of them which <S%G4872>came<s%> up with him from <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> are his <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> to the <S%G2992>people.<s%>
And we <S%G2097>declare<s%> to you <S%G2097>glad<s%> <S%G2097>tidings,<s%> how that the <S%G1860>promise<s%> which was <S%G1096>made<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%>

<S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1603>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G5026>same<s%> to us their <S%G5043>children,<s%> in that he has <S%G450>raised<s%> up <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G450>again;<s%> as it is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5568>psalm,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> my <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> have I <S%G1080>begotten<s%> you.

And as <S%G3754>concerning<s%> that he <S%G450>raised<s%> him up from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> now <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G2001>more<s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> to <S%G1312>corruption,<s%> he <S%G5346>said<s%> on <S%G3779>this<s%> wise, I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you the <S%G4103>sure<s%> <S%G3741>mercies<s%> of <S%G1138>David.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2087>another<s%> psalm, You shall not <S%G1325>suffer<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3741>Holy<s%> One to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1312>corruption.<s%>

For <S%G1138>David,<s%> after he had <S%G5256>served<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> by the <S%G1012>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> fell on <S%G2837>sleep,<s%> and was <S%G4369>laid<s%> to his <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1312>corruption:<s%>
But he, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1453>again,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1312>corruption.<s%>

Be it <S%G1110>known<s%> to you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> and <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> man is <S%G2605>preached<s%> to you the <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins:<s%>

And by him <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G4100>believe<s%> are <S%G1344>justified<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> things, from <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1410>could<s%> not be <S%G1344>justified<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses.<s%>
<S%G991>Beware<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> that <S%G1904>come<s%> on you, which is <S%G2046>spoken<s%> of in the <S%G4396>prophets;<s%>

<S%G1492>Behold,<s%> you <S%G2707>despisers,<s%> and <S%G2296>wonder,<s%> and <S%G853>perish:<s%> for I <S%G2040>work<s%> a <S%G2041>work<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> a <S%G2041>work<s%> which you shall in <S%G3364>no<s%> wise <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1555>declare<s%> it to you.

And when the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G1826>gone<s%> out of the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G3870>sought<s%> that <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> might be <S%G2980>preached<s%> to them the <S%G3342>next<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G4864>congregation<s%> was <S%G3089>broken<s%> up, <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G4576>religious<s%> <S%G4339>proselytes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G921>Barnabas:<s%> <S%G3748>who,<s%> <S%G4354>speaking<s%> to them, <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> them to <S%G1961>continue<s%> in the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G2064>next<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day <S%G4863>came<s%> <S%G4975>almost<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But when the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> they were <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G2205>envy,<s%> and <S%G483>spoke<s%> <S%G483>against<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things which were <S%G3004>spoken<s%> by <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G483>contradicting<s%> and <S%G987>blaspheming.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G3955>waxed<s%> <S%G3955>bold,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> It was <S%G316>necessary<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G4412>first<s%> have been <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you: but <S%G1894>seeing<s%> you <S%G683>put<s%> it from you, and <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G3756>unworthy<s%> <S%G514><s%> of <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G2400>see,<s%> we <S%G4762>turn<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

For <S%G3779>so<s%> has the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> us, saying, I have <S%G5087>set<s%> you to be a <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> that you should be for <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to the <S%G2078>ends<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And when the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> this, they were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorified<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as were <S%G5021>ordained<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G4100>believed.<s%>
And the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G1308>published<s%> <S%G1223>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G5561>region.<s%>
